fields.name: Give Bread to the Poor
fields.description: Distribute bread to the poorest citizens to ease their suffering and reduce unrest.

fields.name: Grand Festival
fields.description: Organize a magnificent festival with games, music, and feasting to keep the people happy.

fields.name: Conscription
fields.description: Force able-bodied citizens into military service. They pay a fee to avoid service, but this is unpopular.

fields.name: Tax Holiday
fields.description: Suspend all taxes for one year to win the favor of merchants and citizens alike.

fields.name: Public Works
fields.description: Hire unemployed citizens for public construction projects, reducing unrest and boosting morale.
